detectors.description:
MetaAggregationRouterV2._takeFee(IERC20,address,address[],uint256[],uint256,bool) (MetaAggregationRouterV2.sol#528-550) Sandwich Vulnerability Detected in '_takeFee' at line [538].
	- Logic: Inequality comparison (<, >) detected.
	- Compares Active Source (Swap/Balance) against User Input ['from', 'totalAmount', 'recipients', 'token']
